name: git-branch-master
description: Level up Inspector for Git Branches

git-branch-master.includeRemotes.title: Include Remote Branches
git-branch-master.includeRemotes.description:
Include remote branches in the view by default.

Including remote branches may slow down the extension, or even unusable if the repository contains many branches (e.g. vscode with thousands of remote branches!). This should only be toggled on for smaller projects.
Also, manual reloads are required for remote branches.

git-branch-master.pinnedBranches.title: Pinned Branches
git-branch-master.pinnedBranches.description:
Branches that would be pinned on top of the view, if exists, in the order given below.
Remote versions of entries e.g. <origin>/<master> will alse be pinned given <master>.

git-branch-master.fetchDelay.title: Fetch Delay
git-branch-master.fetchDelay.description: Delay before performing the next forced Git fetch to update the view in ms. Usually event listeners would be suffice, manually reloading the view is only required for remote branches.

scripts.compile: pnpm run check-types && pnpm run lint && node esbuild.cjs
scripts.package: pnpm run check-types && pnpm run lint && node esbuild.cjs --production
scripts.pretest: pnpm run compile-tests && pnpm run compile && pnpm run lint
